items.title: Cataract surgery becoming an in-office procedure, experts say
items.description: Imagine popping by your eye doctor's office for a quick cataract surgery.

items.title: Scanning the tongue to detect and track motor neuron disease
items.description: Standard MRI scans of a person's tongue could assist in the early detection and ongoing monitoring of motor neuron disease.
